    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Sets everything up and calls starts the game

      • play

        public void play()
        The actual gameplay. Each player has a turn unless they have made an incorrect accusation had therefore lost. Player chooses where to move based on dice result. If They're in a room, they can make a suggestion. Other players will show them 1 card inluding players who have already lost. Player can choose whether they then want to make an accusation. If they are right they win, if they're wrong they and it becomes the next player's turn. Stops when game is won.lose

      • move

        private void move(Player player,
                  int roll)
        User inputs where they want to go. If they try and move too far, they have to choose again unill they've chosen a position they can reach.
        Parameters:
        player - The current player whose move it is
        roll - The dice result, max number of spaces they can move

      • isInteger

        public static boolean isInteger(java.lang.String s)
        Checks if input is an integer
        Parameters:
        s - The string input that we are checking is an int
        Returns:
        Boolean stating if it's an int or not

      • getRoom

        private Room getRoom(int row,
                     int col)
        Finds which squares make up each room. If null, they character isn't in a room.
        Parameters:
        row - X position for 2D array
        row - X position for 2D array
        Returns:
        Room that player is in

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getDeck

        public void getDeck()
        Fills each list with it's respective cards. Selects the murderer, crime scene location and murder weapon. Creates the deck.

      • deal

        private void deal()
        Deals the cards to each player.

      • getPlayers

        private void getPlayers()
        Finds the number of players. Players choose what character they want to be. Player is added to the list of Players.

      • rollDice

        public int rollDice()
        Rolls the dice.
        Returns:
        result A number between 2 & 12 (Possibilities from 2 dice).

      • makeSuggestion

        private void makeSuggestion(Player player,
                            Room room)
        Player can make a suggestion on who, how, and where the victim was killed.
        Parameters:
        player - The current player making the suggestion
        room - The room the player is in (as they can only suggest a room they are in)

      • accuse

        public void accuse(Player player,
                   java.lang.String murderer,
                   java.lang.String murderWeapon,
                   java.lang.String crimeScene)
        Make a final accusation for who, how and where the victim was killed. If they are right, the player wins the game. If wrong, they lose.
        Parameters:
        player - The current Player
        murderer - Suspect they are accusing
        murderWeapon - Weapon they are accusing
        crimeScene - Location they are accusing

      • playerWins

        private void playerWins(Player player)
        Sets gameWon to true. Prints the winner.
        Parameters:
        player - Current player

      • playerLoses

        private void playerLoses(Player player)
        Sets hasLost to true.
        Parameters:
        player - Current player
